intro: Sloanea chengfengensis, commonly known as the Chengfeng sloanea, is a species of flowering plant in the family Euphorbiaceae. It is native to China, specifically found in the Yunnan Province, where it grows in humid, mountainous regions. The plant is characterized by its simple, alternate leaves and small, inconspicuous flowers. It produces woody capsules as its fruit, which contain several seeds. Due to its limited distribution and habitat specificity, it is considered a rare and potentially endangered species.
